records.title: Hustlers
records.info: Inspired by the viral New York Magazine article, Hustlers follows a crew of savvy former strip club employees who band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.

records.title: Rambo: Last Blood
records.info: Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in a final mission.

records.title: It Chapter Two Dual
records.info: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.

records.title: Angel Has Fallen (Hd-Cam)
records.info: Secret Service Agent Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

records.title: Saaho Hindi (Hd-Cam)
records.info: The Story is about a power battle which is taking place in the higher echelons of power unrelated and unconnected episodes occurring in different parts of the globe, Intertwine in an unforeseen manner to a revelation of mind games. The story delves the audience into the game of a brilliant master mind to reveal the true nature of all that are involved. It challenges the perceptions of who is the hunter and who is the hunted. It blends in a thrilling story with commercial elements of story telling to deliver a high octane action entertainer appealing to all segments of the audience.

records.title: Prassthanam
records.info: A rural politician marries a widow with kids and gains a respectable position and trusts his stepson more than his own in political matters; thus upsetting his son beyond limits.

records.title: Chhichhore
records.info: Following a group of friends from university as they progress into middle-age life and go their own separate ways.

records.title: Pal Pal Dil Ke Paas
records.info: When video blogger Saher Sethi embarks on a tedious trek with mountaineer Karan Sehgal, sparks are bound to fly. But will their love story blossom despite the odds?
